text: Tell it, @Dejan_Kovacevic.  We're not that far away from emerging from worst of #COVID19 tunnel. Hang in there for the next 2-3 mos, cont to take simple (& frankly, minimally obtrusive) precautions like masking, show respect (& protect) other people & get #vaccine soon as you can https://t.co/E6nUabCsQS
